summary:
Project management of TPM and Continuous Improvement projects. 
Service management on handling equipment in logistic companies.
Account management for process instrumentation and rotating equipment.
Operational management of a Business Unit assembling customer-specific DCS process control systems for the European region.
Service management on industrial control systems.
Project management of setting-up, transferring & repositioning of organisations on a European level.

Specialties: Operational leadership, engineering & technical leadership, service management, account management, project management, TPM, continuous improvement projects & process improvements, lean manufacturing.
